data.title: 21 Nov. 2024, Jerusalem Wilderness
data.meta_description: Walk through the Jerusalem Wilderness, experiencing serene landscapes and being welcomed by Bedouins living in the desert of Reshayda.  Walk through the desert reaching Hebron, the largest city in the West Bank.  In Hebron, visit the Ibrahi...
data.text:
Day 1:

Meeting Point: Manger Square Hotel- Bethlehem at 08:00 AM

Walk from Artas to Rashaydeh (8h)

Departure for Tequa, visit the site and continue to Rashaydeh.

Dinner and overnight with Bedouin community in the desert.

Day 02:

Walk from Rashayde to Bani Naim (5h)

Enjoy walking all day in the Jerusalem wilderness.

Arrive in Masafer Bani Naim for dinner and overnight.

Day 03:

Walk from Bani Naim to Hebron (5h)

Visit the famous Abrahamic sites in the village and continue walking to Hebron.

Visit the Ibrahimi mosque.

Price includes:

1- Accommodation in local families and in Bedouin camp

2- Breakfast, lunch and dinner

3- Local English speaking guides

4- Bags transfer

The price does not include:

1- Personal expenses

2- Tips

3- Any other services not included above.

Please note: A minimum of 5 people is needed to run the trip.
